author: Caroline Vakil
description: A handful of states are teeing up some of the most highly anticipated primaries of next year, offering clues about the direction for both parties as all eyes turn toward the midterms.  Democrats are bracing for competitive Senate primaries in Texas, Michigan and Maine, some of which have become proxy battles between the party’s centrist and progressive factions.  In Texas and Georgia, two separate three-way…
title: The most exciting primaries to watch in 2026

author: Tara Suter
description: President Trump on Sunday applauded a new ceasefire between Cambodia and Thailand while also taking a swing at the United Nations (UN). “I am pleased to announce that the breakout fighting between Thailand and Cambodia will stop momentarily, and they will go back to living in PEACE, as per our recently agreed to original Treaty.…
title: Trump applauds new Thailand, Cambodia ceasefire

author: Max Rego
description: Outgoing Rep. Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) believes that Democrats will win back the House in next November’s midterms.  During an interview with Jonathan Karl that aired Sunday on ABC News’s “This Week,” the former House Speaker and longtime Democratic leader said it is a matter of when, not if.  “So if the Democrats win the House…
title: Pelosi predicts Democrats will win back House in 2026

author: Max Rego
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky will meet with President Trump at the latter’s Mar-a-Lago estate in Florida on Sunday, as negotiations to end the Russian invasion of Ukraine continue. During their meeting, Zelensky is set to propose his 20-point peace plan, a counteroffer to the Trump administration’s 28-point plan that it presented to Ukraine before Thanksgiving. …
title: What to know about Zelensky’s 20-point peace plan

author: The Associated Press
description: PARIS (AP) — Brigitte Bardot, the French 1960s sex symbol who became one of the greatest screen sirens of the 20th century and later a militant animal rights activist and far-right supporter, has died. She was 91. Bardot died Sunday at her home in southern France, according to Bruno Jacquelin, of the Brigitte Bardot Foundation for…
title: Brigitte Bardot, 1960s French sex symbol turned militant animal rights activist, dies at 91

author: Sarah Fortinsky
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky expressed optimism ahead of Sunday’s meeting with President Trump, underscoring the critical moment before the new year to make progress on peace talks. He said the prospects for peace rest on the willingness of Ukraine’s allies to increase pressure on Russia. “These are some of the most active diplomatic days of…
title: Zelensky ahead of Trump meeting: ‘A lot can be decided before the New Year’
